duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in operative procedures and render quality service to patients and surgeons.
Prepare sterile/unsterile supplies and equipment, and assist with autoclaving of sterile equipment and supplies.
Transport and assist in lifting and positioning patients, report unusual occurrences, and contribute to the efficient operations of the Operating Room.
Partially responsible for the proper care of supplies and equipment and have partial access to medications as required by job responsibilities.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited school of Surgical Technology.
BLS from American Heart Association or Red Cross required.
Minimum one year of CVOR scrub experience.
